job_tasks.phrase: Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server, on platforms like Azure and AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software development tasks using specific programming languages and platforms, fitting the definition of building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies working with and developing software ('big code') and suggests career progression within a software engineering context.

soft_skills.phrase: We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights the company's commitment to employee development and learning, aligning with the 'Learning & Adaptability' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes continuous learning and skill development, fitting the 'Learning & Adaptability' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates communication and interaction with different roles within the company, fitting 'Communication & Collaboration'.

soft_skills.phrase: If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues.
soft_skills.justification: This describes collaborative interview processes involving managers and colleagues, fitting 'Communication & Collaboration'.

soft_skills.phrase: Contact our Talent Acquisition Specialist with any questions.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights direct communication for inquiries, fitting 'Communication & Collaboration'.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software development tasks using a Microsoft tech stack (.NET, C#, SQL Server) and cloud platforms (Azure, AWS). There is no mention of AI, ML, GenAI, LLMs, or related specialized tasks or tools. The role is clearly defined as a 'Graduate Software Engineer' and the responsibilities align with Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering) without any elements from Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization).

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the technologies and responsibilities involved, which are entirely within traditional software engineering. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
